009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012
013import java.util.ArrayDeque;
014import java.util.Collection;
015import java.util.Deque;
016
017import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
018
019import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
020import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.PntUtils;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.line.AlgebraicLine;
022import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
023import imagingbook.common.math.PrintPrecision;
024import imagingbook.common.math.eigen.EigenDecompositionJama;
025import imagingbook.common.util.SortMap;
026
027public class LineFitIncremental implements LineFit {
028        
029        public static boolean VERBOSE = false;
030        
031        private double[] p = null;      // line parameters A,B,C
032        
033        private Deque<Pnt2d> points;
034        private double Sx = 0, Sy = 0, Sxx = 0, Syy = 0, Sxy = 0;
035        
036        public LineFitIncremental() {
037                this(null);
038        }
039        
040        public LineFitIncremental(Collection<Pnt2d> initPnts) {
041//              if (points.length < 2) {
042//                      throw new IllegalArgumentException("line fit requires at least 2 points");
043//              }
044                points = new ArrayDeque<>();
045                if (initPnts != null) {
046                        points.addAll(initPnts);
047                }
048                init();
049        }
050        
051        // --------------------------------------------------------
052        
053        private void init() {
054                Sx = 0; Sy = 0; Sxx = 0; Syy = 0; Sxy = 0;
055                for (Pnt2d p : points) {
056                        addPoint(p);
057                }
058        }
059        
060        private void addPoint(Pnt2d pnt) {
061                final double x = pnt.getX();
062                final double y = pnt.getY();
063                Sx += x;
064                Sy += y;
065                Sxx += sqr(x);
066                Syy += sqr(y);
067                Sxy += x * y;
068                this.p = null;
069        }
070        
071        private void removePoint(Pnt2d pnt) {
072                final double x = pnt.getX();
073                final double y = pnt.getY();
074                Sx -= x;
075                Sy -= y;
076                Sxx -= sqr(x);
077                Syy -= sqr(y);
078                Sxy -= x * y;
079                this.p = null;
080        }
081        
082        // --------------------------------------------------------
083        
084        public Pnt2d[] getPoints() {
085                return points.toArray(new Pnt2d[0]);
086        }
087        
088        public void add(Pnt2d pnt) {
089                addLast(pnt);
090        }
091        
092        public void addFirst(Pnt2d pnt) {
093                points.addFirst(pnt);
094                addPoint(pnt);
095        }
096        
097        public void addLast(Pnt2d pnt) {
098                points.addLast(pnt);
099                addPoint(pnt);
100        }
101        
102        public Pnt2d removeFirst() {
103                Pnt2d pnt = points.removeFirst();
104                removePoint(pnt);
105                return pnt;
106        }
107        
108        public Pnt2d removeLast() {
109                Pnt2d pnt = points.removeLast();
110                removePoint(pnt);
111                return pnt;
112        }
113        
114        public Pnt2d getFirst() {
115                return points.getFirst();
116        }
117        
118        public Pnt2d getLast() {
119                return points.getLast();
120        }
121        
122        // --------------------------------------------------------
123        
124        public int getSize() {
125                return points.size();
126        }
127        
128        @Override
129        public double[] getLineParameters() {
130                if (this.getSize() < 2) {
131                        throw new IllegalStateException("cannot fit line, set of point set is less than 2");
132                }
133                if (p == null) {
134                        fit(points.toArray(new Pnt2d[0]));
135                }
136                return p;
137        }
138        
139        private void fit(Pnt2d[] pts) {
140                final int n = pts.length;
141                //System.out.println("** fitting " + n);
142                
143                double sxx = Sxx - sqr(Sx) / n;
144                double syy = Syy - sqr(Sy) / n;
145                double sxy = Sxy - Sx * Sy / n;
146                
147                double[][] S = {
148                                {sxx, sxy},
149                                {sxy, syy} 
150                };
151                
152//              RealEigensolver es = new EigensolverNxN(S);
153//              double[] e = es.getEigenvector(1);
154                EigenDecompositionJama es = new EigenDecompositionJama(MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(S));
155                int k = SortMap.getNthSmallestIndex(es.getRealEigenvalues(), 0);
156                double[] e = es.getEigenvector(k).toArray();
157                
158                double A = e[0];
159                double B = e[1];
160                double C = -(A * Sx + B * Sy) / n;
161                
162                if (VERBOSE) {
163                        System.out.println("Sx = " + Sx);
164                        System.out.println("Sy = " + Sy);
165                        System.out.println("xc = " + PntUtils.centroid(pts));
166                        System.out.println("S = \n" + Matrix.toString(S));
167//                      System.out.println("eVal = " + Matrix.toString(es.getEigenvalues()));
168//                      System.out.println("eVec = \n" + Matrix.toString(es.getEigenvectors()));
169//                      System.out.println("eVal = " + Matrix.toString(es.getRealEigenvalues()));
170//                      System.out.println("eVec = \n" + Matrix.toString(es.getV()));
171                        System.out.println("A = \n" + A);
172                        System.out.println("B = \n" + B);
173                        System.out.println("C = \n" + C);
174                }
175                this.p = new double[] {A, B, C};
176        }
177        
178        // -------------------------------------------------------------------
179        
180//      static double[][] X = {{ 10, 6 }, { 4, 3 }, { 18, 2 }, { 7, 1 }, { 5, 6 }};
181//      static double[][] X = {{ 10, 6 }, { 4, 3 }};
182//      static double[][] X = {{ 1, 1 }, { 3, 3 },  { 13, 13 }};
183        static double[][] X = {{1, 8}, {4, 5}, {4, 7}, {6, 4}, {9, 4}}; // book example
184        
185        public static void main(String[] args) {
186                PrintPrecision.set(4);
187                Pnt2d[] pts = PntUtils.fromDoubleArray(X);
188                
189//              LineFitIncremental fit = new LineFitIncremental(Arrays.asList(pts));
190                
191                LineFitIncremental fit = new LineFitIncremental();
192                System.out.println("Adding points -------------------------- ");
193                fit.add(pts[0]);
194                for (int i=1; i < X.length; i++) {
195                        fit.add(pts[i]);
196                        System.out.println("size = " + fit.getSize());
197                        AlgebraicLine line = fit.getLine();
198                        System.out.println("  line = " +  line);
199                        System.out.println("  mean square error = " + fit.getSquaredOrthogonalError(fit.getPoints()) / X.length);
200                }
201                
202                System.out.println("Removing points -------------------------- ");
203                for (int i=2; i < X.length; i++) {
204                        fit.removeLast();
205                        System.out.println("size = " + fit.getSize());
206                        AlgebraicLine line = fit.getLine();
207                        System.out.println("  line = " +  line);
208                        System.out.println("  mean square error = " + fit.getSquaredOrthogonalError(fit.getPoints()) / X.length);
209                }
210                        
211                
212                
213        }
214        
215//      line = {-0.4969, -0.8678, 7.2448}
216//      square error = 2.6645834350486606
217//      mean square error = 0.5329166870097322
218
219/*
220 Adding points -------------------------- 
221size = 2
222  line = AlgebraicLine <a=0.707, b=0.707, c=-6.364>
223  mean square error = 1.5777218104420237E-31
224size = 3
225  line = AlgebraicLine <a=0.646, b=0.763, c=-7.026>
226  mean square error = 0.25563166262690407
227size = 4
228  line = AlgebraicLine <a=0.657, b=0.754, c=-6.987>
229  mean square error = 0.2561822766777585
230size = 5
231  line = AlgebraicLine <a=0.497, b=0.868, c=-7.245>
232  mean square error = 0.5329166870097322
233Removing points -------------------------- 
234size = 4
235  line = AlgebraicLine <a=0.657, b=0.754, c=-6.987>
236  mean square error = 0.2561822766777585
237size = 3
238  line = AlgebraicLine <a=0.646, b=0.763, c=-7.026>
239  mean square error = 0.25563166262690407
240size = 2
241  line = AlgebraicLine <a=0.707, b=0.707, c=-6.364>
242  mean square error = 1.5777218104420237E-31
243 */
244        
245}
